thread.title: Gameloft Launches CSI: Slots on Windows Phone, & iOS Devices
thread.title_full: Gameloft Launches CSI: Slots on Windows Phone, Android & iOS Devices - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Gameloft Launches CSI: Slots on Windows Phone, & iOS Devices
text: French publisher and developer Gameloft has just released yet another mobile game, but this time, Windows Phone users will be able to enjoy the new title as well. Usually, major game developers launch their games on Android and iOS platforms, and if they have enough resources, they bring it on Windows Phone much later. However, the new CSI: Slots has been released on all three major platforms: Android, iOS and Windows Phone. The game is available for free, so there's no ... Â»
